articles.content: Shares of State Bank of India (SBI), the nation's largest public sector bank, gained sharply in February, even as the bank reported a weak set of numbers in Q3, affected by higher wage provisions and… [+3209 chars]

articles.title: NMDC shares surge to 52-week high on strong Q3 performance - Moneycontrol
articles.description: NMDC has been added to MSCI's Global Standard index after a February review and is expected to drive $169 million worth of inflows in the counter
